# INBooleanResolutionResult

**Class**

A resolution result for a Boolean value associated with an intent.

## Declaration

```swift
class INBooleanResolutionResult
```

## Overview

Return an [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INBooleanResolutionResult] object when resolving intent parameters that contain a Boolean value. Use the creation method that best reflects your ability to successfully resolve the parameter.

For additional resolution options, see [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INIntentResolutionResult].

## Creating a Resolution Result Object

- **success(with:)**: Creates an object whose resolution involves the successful matching of the specified value.
- **confirmationRequired(with:)**: Creates an object whose resolution requires that the user must confirm the value before proceeding.

## Numerical Values

- **INIntegerResolutionResult**: A resolution result for an integer value associated with an intent.
- **INDoubleResolutionResult**: A resolution result for a double value associated with an intent.

## Inherits From

- INIntentResolutionResult

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
